pkgmetadata.longdescription: Encryption and Decryption of Files and Data for Researchers Without Coding Skills // Support functions for R-based "EQUALencrypt - Encrypt and decrypt whole files" and "EQUALencrypt - Encrypt and decrypt columns of data" shiny applications which allow researchers without coding skills or expertise in encryption algorithms to share data after encryption. Gurusamy,K (2025)doi:10.5281/zenodo.16743676 and Gurusamy,K (2025)doi:10.5281/zenodo.16744058.
